createKhatmah.title: Create New Khatmah
createKhatmah.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for your khatmah
createKhatmah.nameHelp: Choose a meaningful name for your khatmah

createKhatmah.privateHelp: Private khatmahs are only visible to people with the link
createKhatmah.requireNameLabel: Require participants to enter their name
createKhatmah.requireNameHelp: If disabled, participants can join anonymously
createKhatmah.imageHelp: Add an image to make your khatmah more recognizable
createKhatmah.endDateHelp: Set a target date to complete the khatmah
createKhatmah.description: A Khatmah is a complete reading of the Quran, divided into 30 juz (parts). Create a khatmah to invite others to join you in reading the Quran together.
